english_lcz4r_qgis.Rmd

ðŸ›  Download LCZ4r-QGIS plugin in English

Download both the General and Local Functions R scripts for QGIS integration - Download as zip file

Level: Human translation

All functions and their corresponding documentation of the LCZ4r package were translated manually by experts familiar with Climatology, LCZ and GIS.

The zip file includes all necessary scripts to integrate LCZ4r into your QGIS environment. For detailed installation instructions, visit our installation guide.

Note: The cheatsheet provides a summary of key features and step-by-step instructions for running LCZ and UHI analyses in QGIS.
